channel.description: Recent content in 20/20 on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: All American Murder | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A former NFL player and his wife are murdered in Texas and the shocking evidence in their son’s third murder trial. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Cutthroat Inc. | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A successful young businessman suddenly gives it all up to travel the world. As his email messages become increasingly cryptic, his family begins to wonder: are they really from him at all? Originally broadcast on 1/24/2020 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Diary of a Killer | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description The murder of a beloved mom sparks an international manhunt; police uncover clues in an accused killer’s diary. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: 30 Years Searching | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A college student disappears while out running, her body found at the edge of a river. For decades, her family and close-knit town are haunted – was her killer living among them? Finally, DNA – and help from an unlikely source - would identify her killer. Originally broadcast on 9/20/2019 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: My Mother’s Sins | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description Diane Downs is charged with the murder and attempted murder of her own children. As she starts trial, Downs is pregnant with another child. That child is adopted and unaware of her heritage for years - until her curiosity leads to a shocking truth. Originally broadcast on 3/22/2019 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Switched at Birth, or Stolen? | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description After discovering she was switched at birth, Kimberly Mays’ life story played out on television and in court. The showdown between her biological parents and the man who raised her seemed to reach a resolution. But was it really the end of the story? Originally broadcast on November 29, 2019. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: The One That Got Out | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description When multiple women are murdered in Texas, police hunt for a serial killer – but is he closer than they think? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Growing Up Buttafuoco | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A suburban housewife is shot in broad daylight. A teenage girl is convicted of the crime. And a cascade of revelations would feed tabloid headlines and give the story its signature name: The Long Island Lolita. Originally broadcast on 11/8/2019. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: First Divorced Then Dead | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description Reporting on a verdict in the case of a beloved law professor’s gruesome murder. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: I Know What You Did | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description Long-simmering suspicions drive ordinary people to solve crimes. A daughter helps expose a murderous family secret. A wife is determined to uncover how her husband really died. And four women put their lying lover in jail. Stories originally broadcast on 3/2/13, 10/25/2013 and 8/29/14. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Baby Holly Found | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description After a young couple is murdered, their true identities lead to a shocking twist about their missing baby. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Rear Window | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description The murder of a 12-year-old child in October 2011 is investigated after the man accused of strangling the boy to death was acquitted of the crime. Original Broadcast Date: 09/30/16. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: She Was Almost Home | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A young woman’s mysterious disappearance and the search-and-rescue operation that led police to a barn full of dark secrets. Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: By the River’s Edge | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A young woman is found dead along the banks of a North Carolina river. A man is convicted for her murder. Original Airdate: 12/09/2016 Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Deadly Vows | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description After a woman vanishes, police uncover her husband’s dark past. Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: A Case of “Affluenza." | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A teen driving drunk kills four, and his unusual defense causes an uproar. Original Broadcast Date: 10/16/15. Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Snatched | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description When a boy is kidnapped riding a bike, parents, police and a blogger work to bring him home. Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Riley Fox: Daddy’s Little Girl | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A father is accused of murdering his own three-year-old daughter. Original Broadcast Date: 11/7/2008. Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Catch Us If You Can | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description An inmate and corrections officer vanish. Was it a kidnapping – or a forbidden romance? Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Your Biggest Fan | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description This episode charts the meteoric rise of actress Rebecca Schaeffer, whose life was cut short at the age of 21 by a stalker. Decades later, those who knew Rebecca speak about the beloved daughter, actress and friend she was; her hopes and dreams; and the enduring high price of fame. Original Broadcast Date: 04/12/2019. Listen to the 20/20 podcast ad-free on Amazon Music. Learn more about your ad choices.

item.title: Happily Never After | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description The stunning case of an illicit affair, manipulation and murder. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Dying to be Famous: The Versace Murder | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description In July 1997 fashion icon Gianni Versace was at the height of his fame. But his life was on a collision course with a killer who craved the life Versace led. Original Broadcast Date: 07/07/2017. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: True Crime Vault: Shattered Love | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A pregnant wife is found murdered in her home. The investigation reveals her husband had been having an affair. Did his secret love provide a motive for murder? Or was there someone else who wanted her dead? Two trials, twenty years and, finally, justice. Original Broadcast Date: 11/01/2019. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Taken In The Night | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A 12-year-old is kidnapped during a sleepover with her friends; authorities launch a cutting-edge investigation to find her. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Since You've Been Gone | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description After a teen vanishes, her family searches for answers but police see a suspect closer to home. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Long Island Serial Killer | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description The dramatic twists and turns in the more than decade-long investigation into the Gilgo Beach murders. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: The Wicked | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description Payton Leutner speaks out after two friends stabbed her and left her for dead in the woods of Wisconsin to prove themselves to a fictitious character known as “Slender Man.” Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Sincerely, The Happy Face Killer | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description How did a bizarre confession derail the investigation into the first murder committed by Keith Hunter Jesperson, the notorious “Happy Face Killer,” and allow him to remain on the loose, killing at least seven more women? A new two-hour “20/20” reports on how after authorities discovered the body of Taunja Bennett in the Columbia Gorge in 1990, 57-year-old Laverne Pavlinac confessed to the police that she took part in the crime.

item.title: I Now Pronounce You Dead | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description After a woman was found dead, authorities uncovered an elaborate web of lies surrounding James Addie, spun to conceal his biggest secret of all – he was living a double life (OAD 01/07/2022, S44 E10) Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Tragic Beauty: Anna Nicole Smith | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description Anna Nicole Smith’s daughter visits the most influential places in her mother’s life. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Growing Up Buttafuoco | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description The “Long Island Lolita” story through the eyes of Mary Jo and Joey Buttafuoco and their daughter, Jessie, just nine-years-old at the time of the shooting. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Home Sweet Murder | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description An exclusive prison interview with Diane Staudte, the mother behind a sinister plot to poison her husband and two children. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: The Dating Game Killer | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description In the 1970s, a notorious serial killer makes a winning appearance as a contestant on a popular dating show in the midst of his killing spree. (Original Air - 01/08/2021) Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: Truth and Lies: The Family Manson | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description Charles Manson’s tumultuous childhood, his devoted cult, the grisly murders of 1969, and his last network TV interview from prison. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: The King Road Killings | Ep. 5: Unresolved | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description In the fifth episode of the new true-crime podcast “The King Road Killings: An Idaho Murder Mystery”, Moscow is trying to move on from these horrific killings – trying to find its way back to being a place that’s more than the one terrible thing that happened here back in November 2022. But the trial of the suspected killer is fast-approaching, and it’ll surely throw this small town back into the national spotlight.

item.title: Wave of Deceit | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description A new “20/20,” in collaboration with Plum Pictures, features an exclusive interview with Laura Day, nearly a decade after her first-degree Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: The King Road Killings | Ep. 4: Who is Bryan Kohberger? | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description In the fourth episode of the new true-crime podcast “The King Road Killings: An Idaho Murder Mystery,” what was Bryan Kohberger’s life like before he was charged with these murders? People who knew him in his teenage years, in college, and right before he was arrested last December offer conflicting narratives. We piece together a portrait of the man who will go on trial this fall for the King Road killings and, if convicted, could face the death penalty.

item.title: The King Road Killings | Ep. 3: The Investigation | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description In the third episode of the new true-crime podcast “The King Road Killings: An Idaho Murder Mystery,” the small-town police department of Moscow, Idaho, is thrust into the national spotlight, as they try to solve a quadruple homicide and hunt down a killer. Law enforcement gives little information about their investigation until six weeks after the murders when they make a surprising arrest. With that arrest comes a bombshell affidavit outlining all the evidence they’ve kept so closely guarded throughout the investigation.

item.title: Never Made It Home | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description The notorious disappearance of Kristin Smart, whose killer was finally brought to justice after a decades-long investigation. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices Transcript

item.title: The King Road Killings | Ep. 2: The Aftermath | 20/20
item.description: Podcast Description In the second episode of the new true-crime podcast “The King Road Killings: An Idaho Murder Mystery,” nearly eight hours pass after the murders of four University of Idaho students before police receive a 911 call from the house. Why the delay? Who discovers the murder scene and what do they see? Police don’t offer many answers initially, except to say they believe the murders were “targeted,” and that the community is safe.
